before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"7dgtg","text":"A basic understanding on gromacs and simulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1llgj","text":"For visual assistance refer to https://youtu.be/xjfbA1G3PIM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":28}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebcnq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sogr","text":"PART-1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hrtt","text":"The tutorial on Protocol for the development of coarse-grained structures for macro molecular simulation using GROMACS is available at https://protocols.io/view/protocol-for-the-development-of-coarse-grained-str-cp64vrgw.html and visual assistance for the same at https://youtu.be/QMR4f4eRSbs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":135,"length":90},{"key":2,"offset":264,"length":28}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A529D58A01D311EEB21E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtu.be/xjfbA1G3PIM"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C9D4C11C01D311EEB21E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://protocols.io/view/protocol-for-the-development-of-coarse-grained-str-cp64vrgw.html"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D5C1F6CF01D311EEB21E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtu.be/QMR4f4eRSbs"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fstum","text":"Coarse-grained (CG) simulations are a powerful tool for studying the behavior of biomolecular systems. They are becoming increasingly important tools for drug discovery, as they can be used to study a wide variety of systems over long timescales.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8a8u","text":"CG simulations are faster than all-atom MD simulations, which allows researchers to study larger systems over longer timescales. They can also be used to study systems that are too large or too complex to be studied with all-atom MD simulations. Additionally, CG simulations can be used to study systems that are difficult or impossible to study  experimentally. CG simulations are typically 100-1000 times faster than all-atom MD simulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4o08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atji5","text":"This protocol provides steps along with a video tutorial perform CG simulation for protein ligand system. The advantages and test cases are but not limited to identification of active site, detection of cryptic pockets on protein, competitive binding between two or more ligands and many more","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en1p7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg4hp","text":"The link the video tutorial is available in https://youtu.be/xjfbA1G3PIM  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":28}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7C16D36001D211EEB21E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtu.be/xjfbA1G3PIM"}}}}

groups.title: Centre of Excellence in Computational Genomics (Vidya Lab)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dfatf","text":"Preprocessing of protein ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dehe4","text":"Removal of Heteroatoms and if required removing other chains ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49t38","text":"grep \"^ATOM\" 1m4i.pdb \u003e 1m4i_clean.pdb | grep \" A \" 1m4i_clean.pdb \u003e 1m4i_singlechain.pdb ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qcvn","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d172b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C081ACD001E011EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":158,"id":377932,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"35rp3\",\"text\":\"Preprocessing of protein \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcqb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcnb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcpb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcmb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3it9l","text":"Finding secondary structure of 1m4i (AAC2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc7ep","text":"mkdssp -i 1m4i.pdb -o 1m4i.dssp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn6r0","text":"python dssp2ssd.py -i 1m4i.dssp -o 1m4i.ssd","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uksj","text":"Second line of ssd file contains required secondary structure of 1m4i chain A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8riq0","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"830mj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CEDF0B1001E011EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":158,"id":377936,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"fem12\",\"text\":\"Secondary structure of 1m4i\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"2.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcub4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcsb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtctb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcrb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rkbr","text":"Martinize: Convert All atomic model of AAC2 to Coarse grain model","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7st94","text":"martinize2 -f 1m4i_singlechain.pdb -o 1m4i_ONLY.top -x 1m4i_CG.pdb -ss CCCCTTCCEEEEGGGCCHHHHHHHHHHHHHHTTTCCCHHHHHHTCSSEEEEEEETTEEEEEEEEEEEEEEETTEEEEEEEEEEEEECGGGTTSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHCSEEEEECCTTTHHHHHHTTCEECCSCEEEEETTEEEECGGGTTTEEEEESSCCCCTTSCEEEECCSSCCC -p backbone -ff martini3001 -elastic -ef 500.0 -el 0.5 -eu 0.8 -scfix -cy auto  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":331,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avdnr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F128A96001E011EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":358,"id":377940,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"6aotn\",\"text\":\"Martinize: Conversion of  All atomic to Coarse grain model\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"3.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcyb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcwb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcxb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtcvb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkend","text":"Add water and ions using Insane.py script","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d38i0","text":"python2 insane.py -f 1m4i_CG.pdb -o 1m4i_CG.gro -pbc cubic -box 10,10,10 -salt 0.15 -charge auto -sol W","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bf39","text":"copy the number of water and ions (without signs) to Topology file (1m4i_ONLY.top), also add required itp files and rename it to 1m4i.top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec9ai","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"124qu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04DA517001E111EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":216,"id":377944,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"sruj\",\"text\":\"Solvation and Ionisation\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"4.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc4b4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc2b4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc3b4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtczb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnd3s","text":"Insert Ligand molecule","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eavur","text":"Ligand has been parameterised and included for simulation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gjln","text":"gmx insert-molecules -f 1m4i_CG.gro -nmol 1 -ci KAN.gro -o 1m4i_KAN.gro -replace","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55htn","text":"replace water by pressing the water selection. After successfull execution, change the number of water molecules and add kanamycin in molecules section and itp file of kanamycin in the topology file.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91a18","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"483E0EC001E111EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":205,"id":377948,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"bi1k4\",\"text\":\"Addition of small molecule\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"5.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc8b4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc6b4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc7b4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtc5b4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95vfe","text":"MD Production","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9v3t","text":"I have ran for 2ns only to show, but you should increase it to case study.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhnl4","text":"gmx grompp -p 1m4i_KAN.top -f md.mdp -c eq.gro -o md.tpr","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"679pv","text":"gmx mdrun -v -deffnm md","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6609e","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5309i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"71CEED4001E111EE9973B9C45B90515F","height":362,"id":377960,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"3lvss\",\"text\":\"MD Production\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"8.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtdkb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtdib4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtdjb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mtdhb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}
